MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G67 postcode area of Cumbernauld, affecting properties in Corbiston Way and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7.24am. Repairs are taking longer than expected due to an underground cable fault on Clouden Road West and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10.11am on Thursday 18th February 2021..
